name: Mission to...
description:
One week assignment of Prototype studio, a little cube(you) want to blow up the planet.

Control:

R - restart; 

WASD - move;

Space - Turn on/of flash light;

QE - Rotate;

For this week's prototype studio we got a online auction to  bid our prompt. I bought  "Game with  only two colors" and one of them is the world ugliest color(49412A), well, I like the other one at least. The basic idea is to create a 3D snake, and to play with the "two color idea" I added a fully charged flashlight  to see the "invisible" tail.

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
